where pts.company_cd = #{companyCd} and pts.shelf_pattern_cd is not null

mapper.select: select count(*) from planocycle.priority_order_mst where priority_order_name=#{priorityOrderName} and deleteflg=0 and company_cd=#{companyCd}

select from planocycle.priority_order_mst where priority_order_cd = #{priorityOrderCd,jdbcType=INTEGER} and deleteflg=0

select common_parts_data,priority_order_cd,company_cd from planocycle.priority_order_mst where company_cd = #{companyCd} and priority_order_cd = #{priorityOrderCd,jdbcType=INTEGER}
